ul.li: The only proprietary values for the TR-31 header fields supported by this verb are those values defined and used by IBM CCA when carrying a control vector in an optional block in the header.
AES is not currently supported for TR-31 key blocks.
The export is prohibited if the key does not have attributes XPORT-OK (CV bit 17 = B'1') and T31XPTOK (CV bit 57 = B'1').

As of 5.4 and 6.2, this verb supports three-key TDES keys. As a key management service this includes triple-length TDES key encrypting keys (KEKs). For a list of supported triple-length TDES key types beginning with Release 5.4 and Release 6.2, see .
